name: Ultra Happy Glass - Draw Sharp
description:
In Ultra Happy Glass - Draw Sharp, the glass is not happy because it's empty. Your job is to draw one line to make the glass filled up with liquid and the glass happy again!

Ultra Happy Glass - Draw Sharp Puzzle game is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules.

In this tricky mind game you will find a lot of good brain puzzle packs and a daily challenge.

Just a couple of minutes a day with this mind game will help you activate your brain. Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!

Ultra Happy Glass - Draw Sharp game doesn’t occupy a lot of space on your device and it doesn’t drain your battery!

Ultra Happy Glass - Draw Sharp is also deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep. Play through the extensive stages, this game sharp your wits as you have fun.

In this Ultra Happy Glass - Draw Sharp Puzzle game, you will find:
• Hundreds of challenging packs. All of them are free
• Daily challenges. Train your mind with smart brain puzzles everyday
• Hints. In case you find yourself stuck and without any idea how to connect the dots with one touch. You are welcome to use hints!

Only 1% of people can complete some of the puzzles in this game. Can you complete them?
